LanguageData.BaselinersImmuneDesc: Baseliners cannot get oripathy or blood originium buildup.\n\nOriginium will never harm you.
LanguageData.OriginiumPollutionDesc: Originium clusters will pollute the ground when they spawn.
LanguageData.OrifuelDesc: Replaces 'chemfuel' from all def labels and descriptions with 'orifuel' (defName is unchanged)
LanguageData.OrundumDesc: Replaces 'silver' from all def labels and descriptions with 'orundum' (does not affect trade)
